title: Her Vampire Bad Boy
description: NO ONE TAKES WHAT BELONGS TO ME. The moment she walks into the club My hunger roars to life. After centuries of walking alone-- feeling nothing. Caring for no one. The demon, the dominant in me--awoke. Something's different about the lovely human with a delicious scent. My curious little innocent.  For the first time, I feel. I need. I crave. And only she can satisfy. Sheâ€™s MINE.
author: Brenda Trim
